reviewtext: Can't be beat for the money!  It's my second Bushnell and 15 years down the pike it's still as well made as my first, a 7 x 35. This hasn't been my experience with most products, which are getting flimsier with every year that goes by.  OTOH, my 8 x 25 Minolta at 4x the money developed a major flaw almost right away-- just pathetic.  The 10 x 50 is great for birding-- the field is so wide you can actually follow the bird as it flits away.
